document_data.name: Great Garden
document_data.mainbody: The '''Great Garden''' was a wonder found within the fortress of [[Krak al-Mazhar]] in the [[Great Anvil]] of the [[Haunted Lands]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite dragon/268/Secrets of the Brotherhood of the True Flame}}
document_data.Descriptions:
The garden was found deep underground beneath the fortress. It was filled with beautiful flora and a bubbling marble fountain, all of which were real. The pristine blue sky and bird and insect sounds filling the garden were all an elaborate illusion.

The garden measured roughly {{SI|100|ft}} in diameter, but cleverly designed illusions made it appear endless. The paths traversing the garden had a ''[[maze|maze-like]]'' effect upon occupants. Only those who knew the secret command word were immune to this effect.

The "sky" over the garden mimicked the same cycles that occurred above the fortress. A constant gentle breeze caressed every area of the Great Garden.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Nar-Aidiya]] enjoyed relaxing in the garden when he was able to find time. A [[Tasked genie|tasked]] [[slayer genie]] named [[Mujibur]] served as caretaker and guardian of the garden.
